mapper.select: SELECT distinct task_time as taskTime, obj_name as objName FROM misp.pm_tenant_user WHERE task_time >= #{startTime} AND task_time <= #{endTime} ORDER BY task_time
SELECT EQUIPMENT_ID AS eqId, EQUIPMENT_NAME AS eqName FROM pm_equipment_info WHERE IS_DEL='N'

SELECT tc.equipment_id as equimentId, pi.equipment_name as eqName, date_format(from_unixtime(tc.create_time / 1000), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS timestamp, val as dotSum from mp_realtime_consum_data tc left join pm_equipment_info pi on tc.equipment_id = pi.equipment_id where tc.equipment_id = #{eqId} and tc.data_type=1 and create_time >= #{startTime} and create_time <= #{endTime}

select a.id as id, b.EQUIPMENT_NAME as eqName, date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.start_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time, a.chang_coping_count as changCop, c.user_low_threshold as userLow, f.USER_NAME as userName from tbl_equipment_consum_cycle a left join pm_equipment_info b on a.equipment_id = b.EQUIPMENT_ID inner join pm_consumables_equipment c on a.equipment_id = c.equipment_id left join mp_technique_levels d on a.station_id = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_tech_user_relation e on e.TECHNIQUE_ID = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_users f on f.USER_ID = e.USER_ID where 1=1 and a.chang_coping_count > c.user_low_threshold and (a.chang_coping_count - c.user_low_threshold)<50 and a.start_time >= #{startTime} and a.start_time <= #{endTime} and b.IS_DEL = 'N' and c.is_del = 'N' and d.IS_DEL = 'N' and e.IS_DEL = 'N' order by a.start_time

select a.id as id, b.EQUIPMENT_NAME as eqName, date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.start_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time, a.chang_coping_count as changCop, c.user_high_threshold as userHigh, f.USER_NAME as userName from tbl_equipment_consum_cycle a left join pm_equipment_info b on a.equipment_id = b.EQUIPMENT_ID inner join pm_consumables_equipment c on a.equipment_id = c.equipment_id left join mp_technique_levels d on a.station_id = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_tech_user_relation e on e.TECHNIQUE_ID = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_users f on f.USER_ID = e.USER_ID where 1=1 and a.chang_coping_count > c.user_high_threshold and (a.chang_coping_count - c.user_high_threshold)<50 and a.start_time >= #{startTime} and a.start_time <= #{endTime} and b.IS_DEL = 'N' and c.is_del = 'N' and d.IS_DEL = 'N' and e.IS_DEL = 'N' order by a.start_time

select a.id as id, b.EQUIPMENT_NAME as eqName, date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.start_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time, a.chang_coping_count as changCop, c.time_alar_threshold as timeAlar, f.USER_NAME as userName from tbl_equipment_consum_cycle a left join pm_equipment_info b on a.equipment_id = b.EQUIPMENT_ID inner join pm_consumables_equipment c on a.equipment_id = c.equipment_id left join mp_technique_levels d on a.station_id = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_tech_user_relation e on e.TECHNIQUE_ID = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_users f on f.USER_ID = e.USER_ID where 1=1 and a.chang_coping_count > c.time_alar_threshold and (a.chang_coping_count - c.time_alar_threshold)<50 and a.start_time >= #{startTime} and a.start_time <= #{endTime} and b.IS_DEL = 'N' and c.is_del = 'N' and d.IS_DEL = 'N' and e.IS_DEL = 'N' order by a.start_time

select a.id as id, b.EQUIPMENT_NAME as eqName, date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.start_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time, a.chang_coping_count as changCop, c.user_low_threshold as userLow, f.USER_NAME as userName from tbl_equipment_consum_cycle a left join pm_equipment_info b on a.equipment_id = b.EQUIPMENT_ID inner join pm_consumables_equipment c on a.equipment_id = c.equipment_id left join mp_technique_levels d on a.station_id = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_tech_user_relation e on e.TECHNIQUE_ID = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_users f on f.USER_ID = e.USER_ID where 1=1 and a.chang_coping_count <c.user_low_threshold and a.start_time >= #{startTime} and a.start_time <= #{endTime} and b.IS_DEL = 'N' and c.is_del = 'N' and d.IS_DEL = 'N' and e.IS_DEL = 'N' order by a.start_time

select a.id as id, b.EQUIPMENT_NAME as eqName, date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.start_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time, a.chang_coping_count as changCop, c.user_low_threshold as userLow, f.USER_NAME as userName from tbl_equipment_consum_cycle a left join pm_equipment_info b on a.equipment_id = b.EQUIPMENT_ID inner join pm_consumables_equipment c on a.equipment_id = c.equipment_id left join mp_technique_levels d on a.station_id = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_tech_user_relation e on e.TECHNIQUE_ID = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_users f on f.USER_ID = e.USER_ID where 1=1 and a.chang_coping_count >c.user_low_threshold and (a.chang_coping_count-c.user_low_threshold) >50 and a.start_time >= #{startTime} and a.start_time <= #{endTime} and b.IS_DEL = 'N' and c.is_del = 'N' and d.IS_DEL = 'N' and e.IS_DEL = 'N' order by a.start_time

select a.id as id, b.EQUIPMENT_NAME as eqName, date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.start_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time, a.chang_coping_count as changCop, c.user_high_threshold as userHigh, f.USER_NAME as userName from tbl_equipment_consum_cycle a left join pm_equipment_info b on a.equipment_id = b.EQUIPMENT_ID inner join pm_consumables_equipment c on a.equipment_id = c.equipment_id left join mp_technique_levels d on a.station_id = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_tech_user_relation e on e.TECHNIQUE_ID = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_users f on f.USER_ID = e.USER_ID where 1=1 and a.chang_coping_count >c.user_high_threshold and (a.chang_coping_count-c.user_low_threshold) >50 and a.start_time >= #{startTime} and a.start_time <= #{endTime} and b.IS_DEL = 'N' and c.is_del = 'N' and d.IS_DEL = 'N' and e.IS_DEL = 'N' order by a.start_time

select a.id as id, b.EQUIPMENT_NAME eqName, date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.start_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time, a.chang_coping_count as changCop, c.time_alar_threshold as timeAlar, f.USER_NAME as userName from tbl_equipment_consum_cycle a left join pm_equipment_info b on a.equipment_id = b.EQUIPMENT_ID inner join pm_consumables_equipment c on a.equipment_id = c.equipment_id left join mp_technique_levels d on a.station_id = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_tech_user_relation e on e.TECHNIQUE_ID = d.TECHNIQUE_ID left join mp_users f on f.USER_ID = e.USER_ID where 1=1 and a.chang_coping_count >c.time_alar_threshold and (a.chang_coping_count-c.user_low_threshold) >50 and a.start_time >= #{startTime} and a.start_time <= #{endTime} and b.IS_DEL = 'N' and c.is_del = 'N' and d.IS_DEL = 'N' and e.IS_DEL = 'N' order by a.start_time
